string-array.name: nv_tablets_paragraphs
string-array.item: The soft breeze made\nsmall impressions on the\nsurface of the water
The tiny waves seemed to go on\nfor miles and miles
Out across the meadow there were deer\ngrazing on the grass which was\ncovered in the morning dew
Never had there been such a marvellous\nmorning in all my life
The sky had the slightest of clouds, a subtle streak\nof white here and there against the magnificent\nexpanse of blue
Above the trees, the birds circled in flight, calling out to one\nanother in the sweetest of natureâ€™s melodies
All around me the sound of nature was alive and new.\nThe beauty of this morning overwhelmed me.
The sun warmed my face as I gazed about in wonder and awe at the day unfolding before me.
